Package eneter.messaging.messagingsystems.composites.authenticatedconnection

Extension providing client authentication.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAuthenticate
    Callback method to authenticate the connection.
    IGetHandshakeMessage
    Callback method to get the handshake message.
    IGetHandshakeResponseMessage
    Callback method to get the response message for the handshake message.
    IGetLoginMessage
    Callback providing the login message.
    IHandleAuthenticationCancelled
    Callback method to handle when the output channel closes the connection during the authentication sequence.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticatedMessagingFactory
    Extension for authentication during connecting.

Package eneter.messaging.messagingsystems.composites.authenticatedconnection Description

Extension providing client authentication. Provides extension to authenticate connecting clients. If the authentication passes the connection is established. If the authentication fails the connection is closed. For more details see examples:
  • AuthenticatedMessagingFactory - client authenticated when connected
